definition: to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale

sentences.english: We stood there listening to our own breathing.
sentences.chinese: 我们站在那里聆听着我们自己的呼吸声。

sentences.english: I heard Heidi breathe deeply, but she said nothing.
sentences.chinese: 我听见了海蒂清晰的呼吸声，但她什么也没有说。

sentences.english: The sound absorption characteristics of a double layer structure with metal-rubber (MR) material were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 理论研究了金属橡胶材料双层结构吸声特性。

sentences.english: Tom's breathing soothed me to sleep like a lull aby.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆的呼吸声就像催眠曲一样安抚我入睡。

sentences.english: The performance in low frequency can be improved by…
sentences.chinese: 通过改变空腔结构可以改善吸声器的低频吸声性能。

sentences.english: The performance in low frequency can be improved by…
sentences.chinese: 通过改变空腔结构可以改善吸声器的低频吸声性能。

sentences.english: Therefore, the study on non-woven sound-absorbing materials has great significance.
sentences.chinese: 因此研究非织造吸声材料具有非常重大的意义。

sentences.english: The loser's breathing chances for now are ground into the sand.
sentences.chinese: 失败者的微弱呼吸声现在只有地下的沙子能够听到。

sentences.english: An approach is made on technical scheme of developing mineral wool acoustic tile in silence series.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了研制静音系列矿棉吸声板的技术方案。

sentences.english: The utility model provides a sound absorption assembled plate of a wide frequency band;
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型提供一种宽频带组合式吸声板。

sentences.english: Strike forces and the community as a whole are growing louder.
sentences.chinese: 全部社会宽挨乌恶权力的吸声下涨。

sentences.english: She lay in bed, her breath rasping painfully in her throat.
sentences.chinese: 她躺在床上，嗓子里发出粗重而痛苦的呼吸声。

sentences.english: Normally, bronchial breath sounds are sometimes heard over the manubrium .
sentences.chinese: 一般来讲，支气管的呼吸声有时能在柄状体处被听到。

sentences.english: You can hear his labored breathing.
sentences.chinese: 你能听到他费力的呼吸声。

sentences.english: During the night, Pan heard slow footsteps and breathing noises outside his room.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚，潘文石听到屋外传来缓慢的脚步声和呼吸声。

sentences.english: Back wall and side wall at the rear to meet the requirements of sound absorption.
sentences.chinese: 后墙及后部侧墙满足吸声要求。

definition: porous/having many holes (e.g. filter gauze or sieve)
floor/floor (ie. metal plate, concrete slab, wooden planking etc)
window/the opening panel of a window
